p: As shown in Table 1, the differences between our work and previously published results concerned extraction yield, the number of identified compounds and their respective contents. In our investigation, H. gymnocephalum plants were harvested in July 2008, and we treated only leaves for the essential oil extraction. Indeed, H. gymnocephalum was harvested in March 1997 by the team of Mollenbeck et al. [ 26] and between Novemberâ€“December 1994 by Cavalli et al. [ 27].
